org.keycloak.authorization.policy.evaluation

  • Packages that use org.keycloak.authorization.policy.evaluation 
    Package Description
    org.keycloak.authorization
    Fine-grained Authorization SPI.
    org.keycloak.authorization.admin  
    org.keycloak.authorization.common  
    org.keycloak.authorization.permission.evaluator  
    org.keycloak.authorization.policy.evaluation
    Provides classes related with the evaluation of policies.
    org.keycloak.authorization.policy.provider
    Provides classes and a SPI to plug different policy providers.

  • Classes in org.keycloak.authorization.policy.evaluation used by org.keycloak.authorization 
    Class and Description
    Evaluation
    An Evaluation is mainly used by PolicyProvider in order to evaluate a single and specific ResourcePermission against the configured policies.
    PolicyEvaluator
    A PolicyEvaluator evaluates authorization policies based on a given ResourcePermission, sending the results to a Decision point through the methods defined in that interface.
  • Classes in org.keycloak.authorization.policy.evaluation used by org.keycloak.authorization.admin 
    Class and Description
    AbstractDecisionCollector 
    DecisionPermissionCollector 
    Result 
    Result.PolicyResult 
  • Classes in org.keycloak.authorization.policy.evaluation used by org.keycloak.authorization.common 
    Class and Description
    EvaluationContext
    This interface serves as a bridge between the policy evaluation runtime and the environment in which it is running.

    Evaluation
    An Evaluation is mainly used by PolicyProvider in order to evaluate a single and specific ResourcePermission against the configured policies.
    EvaluationContext
    This interface serves as a bridge between the policy evaluation runtime and the environment in which it is running.
    PolicyEvaluator
    A PolicyEvaluator evaluates authorization policies based on a given ResourcePermission, sending the results to a Decision point through the methods defined in that interface.
    Realm
    This interface provides methods to query information from a realm.
